products.title: Splash Chilli Red Roller Blind
products.description: Splash chilli red is a beautiful saturated red shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash chilli red roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Bright Orange Roller Blind
products.description: This bright orange roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This orange fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme. Their rollers are great for privacy and light control.

A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash blush pink roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.
